"Aing of a Lion": A lioness who has lost her voice due to a vocal cord injury or disease.
"The Roaring Lioness": A lioness who has gained a reputation for being particularly loud and boisterous.
"The Silent": A lion who has been trained to be quiet and obedient.
"The Roarless Lion": A lion who has been neutered or has lost its testicles, causing it to lose its ability to roar.
"The Lioness without a Roar": A lioness who has been mute or has lost her ability to speak, causing her to communicate with her pride through other means.
